data.eml:eml: A new species of Metapelopia Silva, Oliveira & Trivinho-Strixino (Diptera: Chironomidae) from Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dantas, Galileu P. S., Hamada, Neusa, Huamantinco Araujo, Ana A. (2016): A new species of Metapelopia Silva, Oliveira & Trivinho-Strixino (Diptera: Chironomidae) from Peru. Zootaxa 4137 (1): 49-60, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.1.3
